1.name: Transport for the owner's account
1.desc:
The owner of the transported goods is also the owner of the means of
                                    transport or rented it for this transport.

2.name: Transport for another account
2.desc:
The owner of the transported goods does not own the means of transport
                                    or has not rented it for this transport.

3.name: Private transport
3.desc: A code indicating privately owned transport.
